Title: Augmenting Traditional Static Analysis With Commonly Available Metadata
Elements_risk_assessment: they do a very good job, the same idea than ours looking for the test !!
UseOF-SZZ: To identify the changesets that have injected a particular bug.
Summary: This dissertation provides a method for leveraging development metadata to find bugs that would otherwise be difficult to find using standard static analysis tools.
Outcome: the ability to find 0day vulnerabilities in large and small software projects by finding new vulnerabilities in the cpython and Roundup open source projects
